com.risk.model

Class GameDriverNew

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.model.GameDriverNew

  • public class GameDriverNew
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class GameDriverNew launches the single game mode, tournament game mode and the load game method.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int playerGTTerr
      The playerGTTerr is flag which goes to 1 when the number of players entered by the user is greater than the number of territories on the map
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> strategies
      The strategies HashMap stores the behaviour of each player.
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> victoryStatistics
      The victoryStatistics keep the statistics for different games.

      Instantiates a new game driver new.

                      int currentPlayerIndex)
        This method launches the single mode game and also the previously saved game.
        Parameters:
        territoryMap - the territory map
        continentControlValueHashMap - the continent control value hash map
        strategies - the strategies
        load - true, if a saved game is being loaded. false, if a new game is being loaded
        tournament - the tournament
        rounds - the rounds
        currentPlayerIndex - the current player index
